pages.text: Waiting for morning is not the most difficult task, as you can simply go to sleep. But what if, for example, you've run out of spider eyes and urgently need to hunt in the night? This ritual, by subduing one of the most fundamental natural currents, is capable of turning bright day into dark night, making the Sun yield to the Moon.
$(l)Note:$() The ritual can only be performed during the day. Beware of lightning strikes!
